data.title: Nobel Prize winner Guglielmo Marconi, the Italian inventor known for his contributions to the invention of the radio and long distance...
data.meta_description:
120 likes, 2 comments - titanic_exhibit on April 25, 2022: "Nobel Prize winner Guglielmo Marconi, the Italian inventor known for his contributions to the invention of the radio and long distance transmissions, was invited to participate in the Titanicâ€™s maiden voyage, free of charge. Although he ultimately declined the offer, his radio system was the one used on the ship. 

Today would be his 148th birthday.".
